description: Try our easy to follow Smoky Pork Ribs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoky Pork Ribs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir 1 tbs hot water into hoisin sauce. Brush over ribs and continue to cook for a further 30 minutes or until meat is very tender. Serve with steamed broccolini.
